summary: Diff implements a centralized visual theme via CSS variables + Tailwind config updates, adds reusable layout/pattern components (AppSurface, PageContainer, EmptyStateCard), and introduces a shared MobileBottomNav used by Customer and Rider shells. Some changes extend beyond pure styling (e.g., Admin login forces a full page reload, new footer/copy elements, and extra global CSS animations/print styles).

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure content is not obscured by fixed bottom navigation; safe padding remains correct on common Android viewport sizes.
missing_requirements.reason: Safe-padding for fixed bottom nav is implemented via `PageContainer withBottomNav` + `.content-with-bottom-nav`, but the shells render pages directly with a fixed bottom nav and the diff only shows Orders pages adopting `PageContainer withBottomNav`. There’s no evidence in the diff summary that the other Customer/Rider tab pages are wrapped similarly, so they may still be obscured by the fixed nav.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin login forces a full page reload after successful login (non-UI behavioral change).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains this to a design/UI-only update (keep behavior unchanged), but the diff adds `window.location.reload()` on successful admin login.

hallucinated_features.description: New admin footer with © 2026 and 'Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai' link.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; adds new user-facing footer content (including an emoji) rather than purely styling existing UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Global CSS added for floating install button animations and print styles.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not mentioned in requirements (REQ-30/31/32 focus on matching reference look-and-feel, bottom nav, empty states, and central tokens). These are additional behaviors/styles unrelated to the specified UI alignment items.
